name: woodsman
description: An Open Source logging API for JavaScript applications of all shapes and sizes
author: Haximilian <haximilian@gmail.com>

scripts.build: google-closure-compiler --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --externs node_modules/haximilian-closure-externs/extern/amd.js --externs extern/*.js --js src/woodsman.js --language_in ECMASCRIPT6 --language_out ECMASCRIPT3 --js_output_file build/woodsman.min.js
